description.en:
MINT Token was developed by an experienced team composed of entrepreneurs, developers, marketers, leaders, and financial experts.  The power of “Proof Of Stake” protocol allows the holders to mine and get rewards through the smart contract of Tron network.  MINT Token was designed with a vision and orientation for the long-term to support large volumes of investors and generate healthy returns for participants in the most transparent way.

The MintChain’s ecosystem is a “Proof of Stake” network, which means that each platform of the Mint network can be linked and used with each other, using the same smart payment method in MINT Tokens. By creating an interconnected network, it will make security easier, and the transfer of information between platforms will become faster, more convenient. By develop MintChain, it will create flow and liquidity for MINT Token. With this ecosystem, the upside potential of MINT Token will be very strong, including: Mint Financial; Mint dApp; Mint Fully Decentralized Wallet; Mint NFT Marketplace; Mint Multi Chain Dex; Mint Travel; Mint Healthy
